summary: The module provides utilities and test suites for benchmarking Kedro pipeline runners. It includes helpers to build simple compute‑bound and I/O‑bound pipelines and a data catalog, and classes that set up the environment, measure peak memory usage, and record execution time of runner components.
business_intent: To allow developers and data engineers to evaluate the performance characteristics of Kedro runners, helping them choose or tune runners for optimal speed and resource consumption in production workflows.
